title: Handle After-Hours Emergency Maintenance Call
description: A tenant calls the after-hours line to report a burst pipe. The on-call manager must take immediate action.

tasks.description: Quickly identify the tenant, property, and confirm the nature of the emergency ('Burst Pipe').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers critical details in under 2 minutes.

tasks.description: Contact the 24/7 emergency plumbing vendor and dispatch them to the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully contacts the emergency vendor and provides them with the address and issue.

tasks.description: Instruct the tenant on any immediate steps to take, such as locating the main water shut-off valve.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, calming instructions to the tenant to mitigate damage.
